data.title: Prepare water resilience portfolio
data.excerpt: Governor Newsom directs many state agencies to prepare a Water Resilience Portfolio (released in July 2020).
data.author: Admin

site_settings.site_description: Learn more about current conditions, the stateâ€™s response and informational resources available to the public.
